info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 7 at 10:57PM EDT until April 16 at 9:05AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river and locations in Indiana...
Big Blue River at Shelbyville.
Flatrock River near Columbus.
Driftwood River near Edinburgh.
East Fork White River at Seymour.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following river and locations in Indiana...
East Fork White River near Rivervale, at Shoals, Columbus, near Bedford, and at Williams.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following river and location in Indiana...
Eel River at Bowling Green.
.Major flooding will continue on the East Fork White River. The crest on the East Fork was nearing Rivervale Monday evening. It should reach Shoals Thursday afternoon. The Big Blue at Shelbyville, the Flatrock near Columbus and the Driftwood at Edinburgh are past crest and falling.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...East Fork White River at Shoals.
* WHEN...Until Wednesday, April 16.
* IMPACTS...At 30.1 feet, During the March 2008 flood, SR 550 extensively flooded on the left bank of the river bridge. One county road on the left bank is totally submerged and another near the hill is barely visible. The south bound lane on the right bank of the river is barely passable, but once over the bridge it ends in deep, fast flowing flood water. There is no Hindostan Falls, just a very big river. Water near SR 550 just before turn off to the Falls. One farmer must boat into his house.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM EDT Monday the stage was 25.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 PM EDT Monday was 25.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.6 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, April 15. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued late tonight by around midnight EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY, APRIL 16

area.areaDesc: Daviess, IN; Dubois, IN; Martin, IN; Pike, IN
